definition: variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)

sentences.english: Stop operation or pump for transferring.
Lighterage at the discharge port, if any, shall be at the Seller's risk and expenses.
sentences.chinese: 卸貨港駁運所有費用和保險由賣方負擔。

sentences.english: All lighterage and use of craft in discharging shall be at the risk and expense of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 卸貨時一切駁運費和駁運險應由貨主承擔。

sentences.english: All lighterage and use of craft in discharging shall be at the risk and expense of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 卸貨時一切駁運費和駁運險應由貨主承擔。

sentences.english: They lightered the goods down to the city.
sentences.chinese: 他們將貨物駁運到了這個城市。
